title: Stuck and needing advice
text:
I had a VSG one year ago and am down 60 pounds! My doctor’s goal was 100 pounds down total, but that last 40 seems so far away at this point. 
I’m very proud of the progress I’ve made! And I’ve been stuck at 225 for 6 months. I’ve talked to my medical team and their advice is always the same “just keep eating protein and drinking water,” which I am doing! I’ve been exercising more and specifically lifting more weights! 
Has anyone else had a long stall? Did anything break it?
